text: (visvasavantayini!) oba bhumiyehi samcaraya karana kalayehi (oba salat karamin sitina avasthavedi) pratiksepa karannan obata vipatak karanu ætæyi biya vuvahot oba (kasar salataya itu kirima, enam obage) salataya keti kara gænimehi oba kerehi varadak næta. mandayat pratiksepa karannan obata prakata saturan vasayenma sitinnaha
